title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1\PreprocessingConfig\Denoise
name: Denoise
description:
Denoise preprocessing configuration.

Note: This configuration is not supported.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1.PreprocessingConfig.Denoise

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.strength
params.description: Set strength of the denoise. Enter a value between 0 and 1. The higher the value, the smoother the image. 0 is no denoising. The default is 0.

params.name: data.tune
params.description: Set the denoiser mode. The default is standard. Supported denoiser modes: - standard - grain

methods.description:
Set strength of the denoise. Enter a value between 0 and 1. The higher the value, the smoother the image. 0 is no denoising. The default is 0.
